Room.Name: Broad Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a broad hallway near the castle library and music room.
Room.LongDescription: This hallway serves as a throughfare for the castle's clerical personnel who work in offices further south. The dining hall is north of here, through Heraldry Hall. Much further north is the famed Ladie's Walk. Immediately south is the library and the music room.
